data.title: Ilaix returns to Spain! The ex of the Barça will play yielded in the Valencia
data.meta_description: Radical change: Ilaix Moriba, Leipzig midfielder and former FC Barcelona player, will arrive on loan at Mestalla to wear the Valencia shirt until the end of the season
data.text:
I list the replacement for Daniel Wass in Valencia! In the next hours will arrive to Mestalla the midfield player of the Leipzig and ex player of the FC Barcelona, Ilaix Moriba, that signs until final of season. Moriba Will dress the T-shirt of Valencia in quality of yielded, but without option to purchase. His arrival is preceded by an operation of consensus between clubs and player.

Valencia decided to incorporate to Ilaix Moriba, of 19 years, because it fulfils with the profile with which Bordalás pretends to rearm his centre of the field after the exit of Wass. The team of Mestalla, in fact, decided to give green light to the game of the Danish footballer thanks to that had the operation of Moriba very encarrilada and that finally will do effective of imminent way.

Ilaix Will land this Thursday in Valencia, where will happen firstly the respective medical review and will incorporate to the trainings of Bordalás of immediate form. The young midfield player, canterano of the Barcelona club, has converted like this in the second wintry reinforcement of Valencia after the central Eray Cömert. Everything with the end of apuntalar his staff and scalar positions in the classification liguera.

At present, Valencia does not cross by his best sportive moment, as it occupies the tenth square of LaLiga with 29 points. To seven points of 'put of Champions League', Valencia will owe then execute a flawless second go back of the Spanish championship to recover stray terrain and can try his classification to the next edition of Champions.

Waste of a valuable opportunity
